query.node: select ci_id, ci_no, ci_name, ci_status, type_id, ci_desc, mapping_id from cmdb_ci where mapping_id in (?)
select ci_id, attribute_id, value from cmdb_ci_data where ci_id in (?)
select * from cmdb_type where type_alias in (?)
select clam.class_id, ca.* from cmdb_class_attribute_map clam inner join cmdb_attribute ca on clam.attribute_id = ca.attribute_id and clam.class_id in (?)
select ci_no from cmdb_ci where upper(ci_no) like upper('%?%') order by ci_no desc limit 1

with history as ( select ci.ci_id, coalesce(max(seq), 0) as seq from cmdb_ci ci left join cmdb_ci_history cch on ci.ci_id = cch.ci_id where ci.ci_id in (?) group by ci.ci_id ) select ci.ci_id, ci.ci_no, history.seq, ci.ci_name, ci.ci_status, ci_type.type_id , ci_type.class_id, ci_type.type_icon as ci_icon, ci.ci_desc, ci.automatic from cmdb_ci ci, cmdb_type ci_type, history history where ci.type_id = ci_type.type_id and ci.ci_id = history.ci_id and ci.ci_id in (?)

with history as ( select ci.ci_id, coalesce(max(seq), 0) as seq from cmdb_ci ci left join cmdb_ci_data_history data_history on ci.ci_id = data_history.ci_id where ci.ci_id in (?) group by ci.ci_id ) select ccd.ci_id, hi.seq, ca.attribute_id, ca.attribute_name, ca.attribute_desc , ca.attribute_type, ca.attribute_text, ca.attribute_value, ccd.value from cmdb_ci_data ccd, cmdb_attribute ca, history hi where ccd.attribute_id = ca.attribute_id and ccd.ci_id = hi.ci_id and ccd.ci_id in (?)
delete from cmdb_ci_data where ci_id in (?)
insert into cmdb_ci (ci_id, ci_no, ci_name, ci_desc, ci_status, type_id, automatic, mapping_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update cmdb_ci set ci_no = ?, ci_name = ?, ci_desc = ?, ci_status = ?, type_id = ?, automatic = ? where ci_id = ? and mapping_id = ?
insert into cmdb_ci_data (ci_id, attribute_id, value) values (?, ?, ?)
insert into cmdb_ci_history (history_id, ci_id, seq, ci_no, ci_name, ci_status, type_id, class_id, ci_icon, ci_desc, automatic, apply_dt) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

insert into cmdb_ci_data_history (data_history_id, ci_id, seq, attribute_id, attribute_name, attribute_desc, attribute_type, attribute_text, attribute_value, value) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
